location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.142 of 1852 from Captain Arnold Kemball, Acting Resident of the Persian Gulf, to Mr Ameer Khan Johannes, Isfahan

mods.abstract: Kemball informs the recipient that he holds a sum of money (7,763.75 Mahomed Shah Rupees) given by the recipient's wards, deposited with him by the outgoing Political Resident (Lieutenant-Colonel Samuel Hennell), pending the Power of Attorney's court decision.
